transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha yes ma'am.
Executive: Ji sorry Tanya baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se aapke account ke regarding connect kiya tha. Actually abhi aapne ek request dali hai sir account ke regarding discuss karne ke liye, Ficro India ke regarding.
Customer: Ha boliye ma'am.
Executive: Ji sir bataiye kya concern aa raha hai aap jo bhi request dali thi connect karne ke liye.
Customer: Manager hai ek Mr. Aftab, usko mujhe IndiaMART ka authorization dena hai taki woh sara marketing mein join kiya hai toh unko sara data detail mile marketing mein. Hamare yaha Sushant ji bhi hai aur ek Yashwant ji bhi hai dono hai. Toh Sushant ke paas bhi woh hai. Inko additional registration dena hai.
Executive: Additional subscription lena hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi inko additional access dena hai.
Executive: Accha access, no issue no issue. Ha ha aap unko boliye sir ko phone de sakte hai sir aap?
Customer: Hmm yes.
Executive: Theek hai sir mai right kar leti hu.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Ha sir aap ek kaam kijiye aap aapke phone mein play store mein jaiye.
Executive: Waha se app download kijiye likhiye waha pe IndiaMART B2B marketplace.
Customer: Ha woh maine kiya hua hu already mere number se khula hua hai.
Executive: Aapne download kar liya hai sir ka sir ke number se hi login karke kiya na 615 wale number se.
Customer: Nahi sir ke number se login karna hai kya?
Executive: Ha jab tak aap sir ke number se login nahi karenge account sahi login hoga. Waha pe mai bata deti hu aapne jo bhi abhi account open kiya hua hai na usme jo hai three horizontal line pe jaiye setting pe jaiyega click karke uske baad.
Customer: Ek second mai bhi kar deta hu. Theek hai ha sir.
Executive: Three dot pe click kijiye setting mein jaane ke baad right side mein aapko three dot milega.
Customer: Ek second.
Customer: Ha mil gaya. Ha open kar liya aise ab isme jau yeh khul gaya app.
Executive: Ha ab usme app fir se open kijiye aur usme sir ka number daliye ga 615 wala.
Customer: 615 wala.
Customer: Ek second.
Executive: Hmm hmm koi baat nahi.
Customer: 615
Executive: Ha 87 se start hai last ka three digit hai 615 87 se start hai sir number mai aapko bata du number?
Customer: Number bataiye.
Executive: One second.
Executive: Sir number likhiye 87
Executive: 100
Executive: 08
Executive: 615
Customer: Likha aapne?
Executive: 00
Executive: Zero
Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir aapki voice hello.
Customer: 871008615
Executive: Yes correct.
Customer: Ji. Isse login ab woh kisi ke ha OTP jayega fir.
Customer: 5754
Customer: Ho gaya.
Executive: Login ho gaya?
Customer: Ha ho gaya. Ji total IndiaMART ka account hai abhi yeh multiple device mein aap login kar sakte hai isi number se agar aap jab aur bhi kisi ko agar access chahiye hoga toh same IndiaMART ka app download karna hota hai sir ka number dalenge OTP se login ho jata hai aur jab tak jo main matlab jo authorize jo aap jinhone sir ka jo number hai agar woh aapko authorize karte hai tab tak aapke phone mein logout rehta hai agar woh jaake setting se apne logout from all device karte hai tabhi sabke jo hai device se logout hota hai. Toh isme yeh nahi hai ki aapko multiple time login karne ke liye OTP mangna padega one time login hota hai yeh desktop mein agar login karte hai aap toh waha pe OTP ki jarurat padti hai. Ab isme services mein use use karne ke liye aapko idea hai sir? Kaise use karte hai usme buylead kaha pe milega lead manager kaha pe milega?
Customer: Ha woh mai jaan lunga jo abhi assigning yeh sirf inke paas hai usse samajh lunga.
Executive: Theek hai agar kuch bhi doubt hota hai na toh aap mujhe same number pe maine abhi aapko whatsapp kar de rahi hu aapka hi number hai na sir yeh 511 wala last ka jo three digit aapne liya hai.
Customer: Ha ha. Theek hai mai is number pe aapko whatsapp kar de rahi hu theek hai. Mera number aap save kar lijiye kuch bhi concern hoga aap mujhe is number pe call call ya message kar sakte hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am.
Executive: Aur ek cheez aur puchna chahta tha sir aapne jaise jo abhi customer care pe call ki thi na toh aapka ek concern raise ho gaya hai mai usko bhi close kar sakti hu?
Customer: Ha close kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai abhi mai yeh close karungi na toh sir aapke paas mail pe sir ke feedback jayega jo register mail id hai please feedback de dijiyega sir.
Customer: Ma'am ma'am ma'am ek baat puchna chahta tha woh laptop mein hai kya?
Executive: Ha sir laptop pe login kar sakte hai.
Customer: Laptop pe usi tarah se kaam hoga na jis tarah se access hota hai.
Executive: Ha thoda sa jo view version alag hota hai desktop site aur mobile site ka agar usme bhi aapko details chahiye hogi na toh kal mai aapko video meeting pe connect karke bhi proper aur bhi lead mein kaise har aap buylead ka kaise use kar sakte hai kaun se filter lagayenge toh aapke liye benefit hoga lead kis tarike se aayegi category aap kaise update kar sakte hai lead manager mein aapko kya kya access milega woh sari cheeze mai aapko bata sakti hu.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai?
Executive: Ha mai abhi concern yeh close kar sakti hu na sir?
Customer: Ha ha close kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir aapke paas ek feedback jayega mail pe please mujhe feedback de dijiyega sir.
Customer: Ha okay. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to give IndiaMART authorization to Aftab.

- Wants to know if he can login on laptop.



Resolution:

- Executive provided steps to login with sir's number.

- Explained the process of using multiple devices.

- Offered a video meeting to explain buylead usage.

- Agreed to close the customer care concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- authorization, login, buyleads, feedback
